CodeInterpreterId.description: The id of the code interpreter.
CodeInterpreterId.markdownDescription:
The id of the code interpreter.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^(aws\.codeinterpreter\.v1|[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_]{0,47}-[a-zA-Z0-9]{10})$  
Update requires: No interruption

CodeInterpreterArn.description: The ARN of a CodeInterpreter resource.
CodeInterpreterArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of a CodeInterpreter resource.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws(-[^:]+)?:bedrock-agentcore:[a-z0-9-]+:(aws|[0-9]{12}):code-interpreter(-custom)?\/(aws\.codeinterpreter\.v1|[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_]{0,47}-[a-zA-Z0-9]{10})$  
Update requires: No interruption

CodeInterpreterNetworkMode.description: Network modes supported by code interpreter
CodeInterpreterNetworkMode.markdownDescription:
Network modes supported by code interpreter

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: PUBLIC | SANDBOX | VPC  
Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws(-[a-z]+)*:iam::[0-9]{12}:role/.+$  
Update requires: No interruption
